SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[ImmobiliAgestaNETTipologie] ( [cod_tipologia] smallint NOT NULL , [AnnunciCategorie_Ky] int NULL , [importa] bit NULL DEFAULT ((0)) ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[ImmobiliAgestaNETTipologie] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_ImmobiliAgestaNETTipologie PRIMARY KEY ([cod_tipologia])
